name: TRASHPET
description:
a game best suited for emptying your downloads folder. feed your pet your old files!!!!!!!!!

don't forget to download the unforgettable soundtrack!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

this is a half-baked idea that i have lost motivation to expand. while it is complete, it is rather boring. i had this idea probably about a year ago (evidenced by this game). i had intended to develop a game about raising a goat who you fed your trash and grew in different ways depending on what sort of data you fed it.
